text: Bonifacio Castillo Cruz (born 1 November 1964) is a Mexican politician from the Party of the Democratic Revolution. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Veracruz. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Veracruz Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Party of the Democratic Revolution politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Bonifacio Castillo Cruz
